categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "PigsMightFly" was the online alias of an Ugnaught who lived on Cloud City. In 3 ABY, PigsMightFly responded to reviews of the Bespin carbon-freeze chamber in Yoda's Guide to the Galaxy, a book written by the Jedi Master Yoda during his exile on Dagobah. The reviews were done by users with the usernames DarkLord66 and HanTheMan, to which PigsMightFly thanked them for their positive comments.
PigsMightFly was first mentioned in the 2021 non-canon reference book LEGO Star Wars Yoda's Galaxy Atlas.
